vulnerability.name: USN-4203-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4203-1 fixed a vulnerability in NSS. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that NSS incorrectly handled certain memory operations. A  remote attacker could use this issue to cause NSS to crash, resulting in a  denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: NSS could be made to crash or run programs if it received specially crafted input. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
